backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and a per-user Moments photo collection with access control, authorization mixins, and blob storage integration for storing photo blobs and metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report documenting implemented product features, mapping feature requirements to frontend files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files describing routing, pages, components, styles, hooks, and overall app behavior for planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions using an OKLCH color system, light/dark themes, typography, and shared UI styles for calendar strips and bottom sheets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring viewport behavior, preloading splash media assets, loading Font Awesome icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application router using TanStack Router, defining routes for splash, onboarding, home, camera, calendar, vault, profile, and settings pages.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: File present but currently empty, likely intended for an animated hamburger menu component.
frontend/src/components/HomeWeeklyCalend: Interactive weekly calendar strip component allowing week navigation, date selection, and visual indicators for planned moments with color coding.
frontend/src/components/InlineToast.tsx: Reusable inline toast notification component that displays a temporary message with fade-in/out animation and optional auto-dismiss callback.
frontend/src/components/MomentsImageCard: React component that renders a styled photo card for a captured moment, showing an image with header metadata (avatar, name, location, timestamp) and optional private details like who it was with, a reflection, and a feeling indicator.
frontend/src/components/PlannedMomentBot: Bottom sheet UI component for creating a planned moment, allowing users to pick a time, optional title, and who the moment is with, then saving it with an associated color and date.
frontend/src/components/SignInOverlay.ts: File is present but contains no implementation or exported code.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, handling authenticated and anonymous identities and refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoGeolocation.ts: Hook that automatically requests browser geolocation once per session when enabled and returns coordinates via a success callback without throwing on errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that tracks whether a DOM element is in view, with configurable thresholds and optional one-time triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/useMomentsPhotos.ts: Hook that loads locally stored moment photos, tracks the most recent photo, and updates state in response to storage or custom update events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlannedMoments.ts: Hook that manages planned moments from local storage, exposing moments for a selected date along with calendar metadata and a function to add new moments.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hook that loads and updates the user profile from local storage, auto-requests geolocation when missing, and syncs changes across tabs and events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks that interact with the backend, currently exporting nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with imported Google font, extensive OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables, and base styles. Also defines custom UI styles for glass cards, home planning containers, and weekly calendar components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that creates the React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Imports global styles and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Implements a weekly calendar view with navigation, date selection, and indicators for photo and planned moments. Integrates planned moments state, localStorage photo checks, and a bottom sheet for date actions.
frontend/src/pages/CameraScreen.tsx: Provides a mobile camera capture screen using a custom camera hook, supporting photo capture, retake, file upload fallback, and draft saving. Navigates users through the capture and save flow with error handling for unsupported devices.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Defines the main home screen with logo header, search bar, weekly calendar strip, and navigation to camera, calendar, vault, and profile. Manages date selection and opens a planning bottom sheet.
frontend/src/pages/MobileSplashScreen.ts: Implements a multi-card animated onboarding splash screen with images/videos, autoplay transitions, and Internet Identity login integration. Handles slide navigation, animations, and redirect after successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MomentFeelingCheckPag: Displays a post-capture prompt asking users to tag a moment with a feeling and updates stored moment data. Loads the saved moment ID, clears drafts, and redirects back to home after selection.
frontend/src/pages/MomentsPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page that lets users update display name, location, and profile picture, copy an invite code, and navigate to settings or home with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/SaveMomentConfirmPage: Confirmation screen for saving a captured photo as a moment, allowing selection of who it was with and an optional reflection before persisting to local storage and navigating to a feeling check.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings screen with navigation back to home and a logout action that clears the Internet Identity session and redirects to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/VaultMomentPage.tsx: Full-screen viewer for a single saved moment, loading by ID from storage and displaying the photo with metadata such as time, who, reflection, and feeling.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Vault overview page that loads saved moments, groups them by month, and displays animated thumbnail grids with navigation to individual moment views.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Animated welcome screen with branded visuals and entrance effects that navigates the user to the home page when getting started.
Provides localStorage-based utilities for saving, loading, updating, and querying captured moment photos, including metadata like reflection and feeling. Emits a custom browser event to notify same-tab listeners of photo changes.
frontend/src/utils/pendingMomentDraftSto: Implements sessionStorage-backed temporary storage for in-progress moment drafts, confirmation details, and the saved moment ID during the capture flow. Data persists only for the current browser session and can be cleared atomically.
frontend/src/utils/plannedMomentsStorage: Manages localStorage persistence for planned calendar moments, including creation, date-based queries, and deterministic color mapping per date. Dispatches custom and storage events to keep UI in sync across and within tabs.
frontend/src/utils/profileStorage.ts: Handles localStorage persistence of the user profile, ensuring an invite code is generated and present. Dispatches a custom event when profile data is updated for reactive UI updates.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Defines a helper to format timestamps into short relative time strings (seconds to days ago) and falls back to a concise date for older entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading parameters from query strings or hash-based URLs, persisting them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing them across navigation. Supports secure extraction and cleanup of sensitive URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content sources, dark mode, container defaults, extended OKLCH-based color tokens, animations, and design tokens. Includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the appâ€™s current product state, describing the Moments app concept, UX flows, and a catalog of implemented features with versions. Used to track scope, architecture, and feature completeness over time.
